title: Ping issues on EUW as of 6.22
body:
Just after the new patch i noticed my ping had gone from 28 to 80, also it regularly spikes to 200-300 and i dc every 5-10 minutes. I have no problems with my ISP and I've done everything i can on my end to make it go down and nothing has helped.
Anybody else having the same problems/found a solution/a reason for what is going on

replies.body:
Since patches only change local files in your League directory, it's **very unlikely** that they've impacted your connection to the servers. Big hikes in latency are often caused by either local network configurations or ISP routing problems. I'd strongly recommend working through our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to ensure your local network settings are compatible with League.

Let me know if those changes helped.

Please help us. I've been having the exact same problem since 6.22. My internet is totally fine. I NEVER in years of playing with this PC and through this provider had any ping spikes. 6.22 makes LoL for me and many others unplayable. There IS a problem with this patch.

I've also encountered lag spikes after the pre-season (the patch) and especially more AFTER THE alpha client. It's maybe because it's a new season and it's supposed to be more.. how do I say.. " Get used to the new huge patches and the reworks of champions) I'm not really good at this but try to shut down unnecessary applications in the background during a league of legends game, I'm pretty sure that lowers the lag spikes, (Has worked for me so far).. I wish you the best!

Best wishes, A Kat Main {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
